author: Michael
content:
I just want to say thank you for showing an interest in my blog. I have been reading yours for a few weeks now, via my friend's blog. I really like the way you compose the layout of your posts, and as I kind of said the other day, it inspired me to upgrade mine. I swear I'm trying my best not to copy, but rather to come up with a similarly clever layout. ðŸ™‚

I also want to thank you for asking me such probing questions. They really got the wheels in my head turning, and I decided to post about it. You can see my answers to your questions here.
